*R/spark_connection.R*

## spark_connection

## Description
 Retrieve the `spark_connection` associated with an `R` object. 


## Usage
```r
 
spark_connection(x, ...) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An `R` object from which a `spark_connection` can be obtained. |
| ... | Optional arguments; currently unused. |
